title: Get Renters Insurance Quote
description: A person renting an apartment wants a quote for renters insurance.

tasks.description: Gather the applicant's address and desired amount of personal property coverage.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent collects the necessary information for a renters quote.

tasks.description: Explain the difference between personal property coverage and liability coverage.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent clearly explains what each part of the policy covers.

tasks.description: Generate and present a quote for a standard renters policy.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent provides a quote for the requested coverage.
